meanings.definition: Not participating in a game or sport.
meanings.sent1: The nonplaying students watched the soccer match from the sidelines.
meanings.sent2: She felt left out when her friends were nonplaying during the basketball game.
meanings.sent3: The nonplaying team mascot decided to join in and do a funny dance on the field.
meanings.sent4: The nonplaying chess pieces on the board seemed to mock the active ones with their stillness.
meanings.sent5: The nonplaying role of referee was crucial in ensuring fair play.

meanings.definition: Not involved in playing music or acting.
meanings.sent1: The nonplaying musicians waited backstage for their turn to perform.
meanings.sent2: He felt a bit lonely being nonplaying while his friends rehearsed for the play.
meanings.sent3: The nonplaying actors decided to create a funny skit of their own behind the scenes.
meanings.sent4: The nonplaying instruments seemed to hum softly in anticipation of their next performance.
meanings.sent5: The nonplaying understudy eagerly awaited the chance to step into the spotlight.

meanings.definition: Not functioning as a player in a game or performance.
meanings.sent1: The nonplaying video game controller lay untouched on the table.
meanings.sent2: She felt a bit left out when she was nonplaying in the school play.
meanings.sent3: The nonplaying microphone suddenly crackled to life and started singing on its own.
meanings.sent4: The nonplaying puppet strings seemed to dance in the air, longing to be pulled.
meanings.sent5: The nonplaying backup dancers added a touch of mystery to the performance.
